Text:
Hi 20-40,
Thanks for the encode/upload.

Cheers
Jon

@ ALL - I read the comments from BBE09 that is referred to by 20-40 in his NOTE: 'lies'.

Do NOT believe them. It is coming from a bunch of HATERS (I will not name anyone but they KNOW who they are) who do not do as good a job on their encodes as 20-40.

20-40 has slowly being winning their audience and they are running scared and are fighting back by trying to slur his release(s).

I am a huge fan of 20-40, won't say or pretend otherwise and would wait for his release(s) rather than get some other (bigger size always) release that comes out quicker.

I watch ALL his encodes on a PS3 via HDMI to a 32" LCD. I have no problems with any of them.

@ HATERS - do a better job on your own release(s) and FUCK OFF!!!
@dice100: Thanks for that. "Upping" take about 3 seconds. Encoding however, took 6 hours (22800 seconds to be precise) and I am ungrateful bastard who rather wants to receive thanking for that.

Bryan Cranston is becoming one of my favourite actors.In this very funny episode he gets to use the full range of his talents.I don't want to leave any spoilers so I'll just say that this episode should go down as a classic.(IMHO)
Thanks again 20-40.
This version will not sync to my Iphone 3gs, it says it is not compatible.  Not sure why.
@yinzer: It is 720p. Older iPods handle 272p, newer ones up to 360p. Their graphic engine cannot handle 1280x720 frame-size.

Help! this torrent gave me an really bad virus, my anti-virus can't get rid of it and everytime I try to delete it it goes into a loop of shuting down and restarting windows explorer.  someone please help me!
what do you mean "already seen"? did you hack my computer? I Had to end up doing a complete system wipe.
